name: MIST (Mr Opinion)
description:
Trapped within an abandoned factory, you must activate an array of consoles to lift security and escape to safety. Inside the warehouse security room resides The Mist: a sentient being that guards the factory from unwanted guests. The Mist can be easily tracked via the trail it leaves in its wake. Beware of contact with the Mist Trail, as The Mist is known to be agitated at the slightest disturbance, transforming its Trail into hostile Mini-Mists. If you come in contact with any form of sentient Mist, a quick asphyxiation is the best you can hope for...

Collect the keys, activate the consoles, find the escape. Your only chance at survival depends on it.

Mist is a Virtual Reality game and requires use of a VR Headset.
